amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funds in the Science account by $223 million and reduce funds in the Weapons Activities account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds in the Science account by $223,000,000 and reduce funds in the Weapons Activities account by $223,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A026) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 266 (Roll no. 328).
